description: Provide catering service to prepare and serve meals to personnel according to a list providing date, meal and quantity.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Invitation to Offer (ITQ) for Catering Services
#### Date: December 14, 2023
#### Closing Date: December 19, 2023, 14:00:00

This tender is for a catering service that will prepare and serve meals to personnel at the National Defence's Base Shannon.

### Procurement Details

* **Tender Number:** W3010-24-3501/A
* **Procurement Method:** Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Competition Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Contract Term:** Planned Start Date: January 2, 2024, Planned End Date: January 7, 2024

### Documentations

The tender document is available for download:
* **English:** [Tender Notice]({{ "https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27590/w3010-24-3501_a---request-for-proposal.pdf" | relative_url }})
* **French:** [Demande de propositions]({{ "https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27590/w3010-24-3501_a---demande-de-proposition.pdf" | relative_url }})
 
### Solicitation Details
* **Contracting Authority:** National Defence
* **Solicitation Description:** This procurement is for a catering service that will provide breakfast and lunch meals for personnel on the date specified in the attached meal plan. The catering service must provide all the necessary equipment, supplies, and staff to prepare and serve the meals.
* **Information Contact:**
	+ Name: Martin Morin
	+ Email: [Martin.Morin3@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Martin.Morin3@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 550-9017

### Proposals
Only proposals from caterers in the valued estimating price range will be evaluated. Submission must be in PDF, postmarked no later than the closing date.

However, there's an optional document which provides a bit more detail to the tender:
```
* **Meal Plan:** (optional)
The meal plan is the list of meals to be prepared and served by the catering service. It will be attached to this RFP package and also available to bidders.
```Please use all the details you found in the initial text and ensure your rewritten entry contains all necessary information
